text:
@WhiteHouse In January the WHO gave the US the Covid-19 DNA makeup.
Why did the Administration not start making tests?
South Korea had mass testing 10 days after their 1st confirmed case on 1/20/20.

The United States 1st confirmed case 1/20/20
Your Administration Failed
#TrumpFailedTesting
